titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 5919 Chef Menteur Highway in New Orleans, Louisiana, as the "Daryle Holloway Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 7/15/2015--Introduced. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 5919 Chef Menteur Highway in New Orleans, Louisiana, as the "Daryle Holloway Post Office Building."
